meanings.definition: Preventing or inhibiting the growth and spread of cancer cells.
meanings.sent1: The antineoplastic treatment helped stop the cancer from spreading.
meanings.sent2: Doctors prescribed an antineoplastic medication to slow down the growth of the tumor.
meanings.sent3: The antineoplastic therapy was like a shield protecting the body from the cancer invasion.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to fight the disease was as strong as an antineoplastic barrier.
meanings.sent5: The antineoplastic effect of the treatment was like a superhero battling the cancer cells.

meanings.definition: A drug or substance that has the ability to destroy or inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
meanings.sent1: She was relieved when the doctor prescribed an antineoplastic to target the cancer.
meanings.sent2: The antineoplastic was administered to attack the cancer cells directly.
meanings.sent3: The antineoplastic drug worked like a warrior fighting against the cancer invasion.
meanings.sent4: The power of the antineoplastic substance was like a shield against the cancer's growth.
meanings.sent5: The antineoplastic medication acted as a guardian, protecting the body from the cancer threat.
